attributes.action: Abolish postal voting & impliment a system of internet voting.
attributes.additional_details: If undeniable proof has to be entered online before a vote is cast then that stops the interference of people to illegally change or add numbers to a voting system therefore changing the outcome of any voting process.
attributes.background: Postal voting does not work due to vote rigging. Set up a system  that allows people to vote online after strong undeniable I.D CHECK for everyone that needed a postal vote that cannot be tampered with or allows more than one vote per person. This has to be done to safe guard democracy in the U.K.
